subject: Simsonn Plus X on Aliexpress to Brazil
description_text:
Hello Simsonn Team,

I am writing to inquire about the Simsonn Plus X pedals. I noticed on 
your AliExpress store that you currently do not ship this item to Brazil.

I would like to know if you have any plans to enable shipping to Brazil 
in the near future. I am very interested in purchasing your pedals 
through AliExpress to take advantage of Brazil's "Remessa Conforme" 
program, which simplifies the import process and taxation for customers.

Thank you for your time.

Best regards,

Rafael Teixeira

conversations.body_text: Hi Rafael Teixeira,    Sorry, due to some special reasons, we closed the Aliexpress to Brazil store, you can buy it on our official website.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-plus-x-pedals
